hero.name: Khushi Dadhaniya
hero.description: Aspiring Computer Science Engineer with a strong foundation in programming and problem-solving. Seeking opportunities to apply my skills in web development, data analysis, Machine Learning and gain hands-on experience through internships or projects.

eduRadar.title: EduRadar — Tutor Finder Platform
eduRadar.description: An EdTech project that connects students with nearby tutors using GPS-based search, advanced filters, and in-app messaging. Key Features: Location-based search, student/tutor profiles, secure authentication, real-time chat, and tutor reviews.

inclusivePay.title: InclusivePay — Financial Inclusion Platform
inclusivePay.description: A fintech platform designed to support underbanked communities by offering budgeting tools, secure digital payments, and financial literacy programs. It includes personalized financial advice powered by AI and gamified learning to improve money management. The platform ensures accessibility with low-cost transactions and multilingual support.

education.title: Education
education.courses: Relevant Courses: DSA, Computer Networks, DBMS, Operating Systems, Design and Analysis of Algorithms
